nodes.text: This pointed-eared humanoid worked as a bounty hunter during the Galactic Civil War.

This bounty hunter was part of a bounty hunter group on Centares shortly after the Battle of Yavin. When the name of the Rebel pilot who destroyed the first Death Star was revealed, Vader and his stormtroopers killed the hunter and every other individual who heard it.
This unidentified individual was created by Star Wars artist Dave Gibbons for Vader's Quest 1 of the Vader's Quest series of comics, published in 1999 by Dark Horse Comics.
This bounty hunter's species was not specified in the comic book.
Leland Chee, on the StarWars.com Message Boards, stated that his theory is that "all pointy-eared species are either Sephi or closely related to Sephi."
